duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategically processes order queue and daily workload to prevent backlog, limit cancelations, maintain proper customer touchpoints, and prioritize fulfillment of expedited orders.
Oversees the omni process to ensure brand fill rate goals are maintained and the brand standard is followed.
Shares relevant information with the leadership team regarding omni processes to ensure goals are met, standards are achieved, and tasks are completed.

education_certification.credential: No specific educational requirements, high school diploma or equivalent preferred.
